00154   void learn(const Array<double> &in, const Array<double> &target, double lr = 0.1, double mu = 0.3) {
00155     if(!m.ndim() || m.dim(0)!=dedw.dim(0)) {
00156     //if(!m.ndim()) {
00157     //geaendert, mt feb-2000
00158       m.resize(dedw);
00159       m = 0;
00160     }
00161     if(in.ndim() == 1) {
00162       derror(in, target,false);
00163       m = -lr * dedw + mu * m;
00164       w += m;
00165     } else {
00166       unsigned index, pattern;
00167       vector< int > vec( in.dim(0) );
00168       vector< int >::iterator it;
00169        for( unsigned i = 0; i < vec.size( ); ++i )
00170         vec[ i ] = i;
00171       for(unsigned number = 0; number < in.dim(0); ++number) { 
00172         index   = Rng::discrete(0,vec.size( )-1);
00173         pattern = vec[ index ];
00174         for(it = vec.begin(); *it != (int)pattern; it++);
00175         vec.erase(it);
00176         derror(in[pattern], target[pattern],false);
00177         m = -lr * dedw + mu * m;
00178         w += m;
00179       }
00180     }
00181   }
00182

00207   void learnfast(const Array<double> &in, const Array<double> &target, 
00208                  double lr = 0.1, double mu = 0.3                  ) 
00209   {
00210     if(!m.ndim()) {
00211       m.resize(dedw);
00212       m = 0;
00213     }
00214     if(in.ndim() == 1) {
00215       derror(in, target,false);
00216       m = -lr * dedw + mu * m;
00217       w += m;
00218     } else {
00219       unsigned pattern;
00220       for(unsigned number = 0; number < in.dim(0); ++number) { 
00221         pattern = Rng::discrete(0,in.dim(0)-1);
00222         derror(in[pattern], target[pattern],false);
00223         m = -lr * dedw + mu * m;
00224         w += m;
00225       }
00226     }
00227   }
